product_name: Pearl Izumi Attack 3/4 Bike Bib Tights - Men's
long_description: With their extended coverage over the knees, the men's Pearl Izumi Attack 3/4 Bike Bib Tights extend your cycling comfort range into more transitional weather conditions. Nylon/spandex fabric wicks moisture and dries quickly to keep you riding in comfort. Direct-Vent panels and mesh upper bib enhance ventilation. Bibs feature an 8-panel anatomic design. Race 3D Chamois(R) offers breathable 4-way stretch and pressure relief for the enthusiast-to-intermediate rider. Flatlock seams and silicone leg grippers let you bike without chafing or pant legs riding up. Pearl Izumi Attack 3/4 Bike Bib Tights for men feature reflective elements for increased visibility in low light.
short_description: With their extended coverage over the knees, the men's Pearl Izumi Attack 3/4 Bike Bib Tights extend your cycling comfort range into more transitional weather conditions.
